author: Dr. Mark Abdelmalek, Eden David, Josh Margolin
title: Why coronavirus antibody testing in one town could provide a way forward
description: Testing going on in the Colorado ski town could allow lifting of restrictions.
content:
While it might be impossible to figure out who is going to become sick with novel coronavirus, some public health experts believe the more critical question may be who has already been exposed.
In Telluride, Colorado, last week, one biotech company put that … [+6082 chars]
